title: AI Summary Helper 🚀
aboutText: Elevate your online reading efficiency with the AI Summary Helper. Never miss out on key information from any article! 🌟
featureList: Personalize your article summaries with a touch of magic ✨
Supports multiple AI models including OpenAI, Mistral AI, Ollama, and more
Seamlessly integrate summaries into your reading routine 📖
Mobile reading made easy: Share summaries directly to Kindle with Reabble 📖
Universal Access: Create bookmarks across all browsers and platforms, including iOS
proposeFeatureText: Have an innovative idea? Contribute to the evolution of AI Summary Helper by sharing your ideas with us! 🗨️
privacyNoteText: We prioritize your privacy. Rest assured, your data remains secure with us. 🔑
funMessage: Explore a smarter browsing strategy with AI Summary Helper! 🎉
changelogList: Now supports Local LLMs including Ollama and Llama models
Upgraded to support Mistral AI model
creatorText: Greetings, Gumroad community! I'm Phil Wornath, creator of AI Summary Helper. As a devotee of in-depth web content, particularly academic articles, time constraints frequently challenged me. This spurred the creation of a tool aimed at boosting productivity and enhancing reading efficiency.
whyHelperList: Reclaim Your Time: Instantly create digests or prepare for comprehensive reviews later.
Tailored to Your Needs: Customize summaries to align with your language, professional background, or personal perspective.
Stay Organized: Keep your reading list tidy and manageable.
Enhanced Reading Experience: Focus solely on what's important to you, reducing information overload.
getStartedText: Begin your journey with AI Summary Helper by securing an OpenAI API key and ensuring you have enough credits. Join our community today and transform your web reading into a more efficient, accessible experience. Download now on Gumroad!
feedbackSupportText: We invite you to try AI Summary Helper and eagerly await your feedback and questions. Join us in simplifying and enhancing web reading. Boost your online reading efficiency with AI Summary Helper today!
